column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Kimberly - Thanks for your great review. I'm grateful you gave us your best shot
column2: as well as a fair assessment. We haven't been so lucky with other patrons who have decided they just don't enjoy ramen. But like I have said many times here on Yelp
column3: we're never going to be all things to all people. But we do work hard and try our best to provide the best ramen we are capable of producing.
